description: Brick is like the football player you knew in High School who had nothing more then beers and balling on his brain. He grew up into the football coach who thinks of nothing else either. From the start, in his cut off grey T-shirt and yellow practice down to the tightey-whiteys underneath, Brick is one third jock, one third clown and one third sex kitten all rolled into one.  Guess there is a fourth part and that is a big ham too.  Brick loved being in front of the camera as much as anyone we have every filmed.  The faces, the comments, the way he stripped off every piece of clothing  until he worked that cock and sent off a load that definitely flew over the goal posts!
title: Brick The Movie, Scene #01
